articles.title: Rankings boost for India after eye-catching series triumph - International Cricket Council
articles.description: India's narrow series triumph over England away from home has seen Rohit Sharma's side cling on to third place just ahead of Pakistan on the latest Men's ODI Team Rankings.

articles.title: Watch: Buttler's epic reply to journalist's 'Is Pant the most audacious player' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Following the loss, Buttler was asked about his opinion on Pant and how difficult it is for a captain to set the field and a game plan for a player of his talent. But the England captain gave a Jasprit Bumrah mention in his epic reply to the journalist.
articles.content: England captain Jos Buttler may look like a serious cricketer on the field, but on Sunday, he showed his witty side as well as he responded to a Rishabh Pant question after the hosts lost by five wic… [+2107 chars]
